org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: Error-DrugDuration
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: Pharmacy forms without drug duration or duration out of range
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery: select obs.person_id as patientID, encounter.encounter_id, pid1.identifier as pepfarID, pid2.identifier as hospID, person.gender as Sex, person.birthdate as DoB, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, person.birthdate,curdate()) as Age, DATE_FORMAT(encounter.encounter_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y') as DispenseDate, form.name as PMMForm, CONCAT(pn2.given_name,'',pn2.family_name) as DispensedBy, CONCAT(pn1.given_name,'',pn1.family_name) as enteredBy, encounter.date_created as dateEntered ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165724,cn1.name, NULL)) as `OIDrugName` ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165727,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ARVDrugName` ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165304,cn1.name, NULL)) as `TBDrugName` ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165725,cn1.name, NULL)) as `DrugStrength` ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165723,cn1.name, NULL)) as `DrugFrequency` ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159368,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `DrugDurationDays` ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159368,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `DrugQuantityPrescribedValue` ,MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=1443,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) as `DrugQuantityDispensedValue` from obs left join person on(person.person_id=obs.person_id and person.voided=0) left join patient_identifier pid1 on(pid1.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid1.identifier_type=4 and pid1.voided=0) left join patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=obs.person_id and pid2.identifier_type=5 and pid2.voided=0) left join encounter on(encounter.encounter_id=obs.encounter_id and encounter.voided=0) left join encounter_provider on(encounter_provider.encounter_id=encounter.encounter_id) left join users usr1 on(usr1.user_id=encounter.creator and encounter.voided=0) left join person_name pn1 on(usr1.person_id=pn1.person_id and pn1.voided=0) left join person_name pn2 on(encounter_provider.provider_id=pn2.person_id and pn2.voided=0) left join form on(form.form_id=encounter.form_id and encounter.voided=0) left join concept_name cn1 on(obs.value_coded=cn1.concept_id and cn1.locale='en' and cn1.locale_preferred=1) where encounter.form_id=27 and encounter.voided=0 and obs_group_id is not null and encounter.encounter_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate GROUP BY obs.person_id,encounter.encounter_id,obs.obs_group_id HAVING ( MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165724,cn1.name, NULL)) IS NULL AND MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165727,cn1.name, NULL)) IS NULL AND MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165304,cn1.name, NULL)) IS NULL ) OR MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159368,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) IS NULL OR MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=159368,obs.value_numeric, NULL))>180
